p: The C18:0 content ranged from a minimum of 2.88% (GF) to a maximum of 3.31% (MD), yielding a mean of 3.08%. Similar mean contents of C18:0 were detected in the southern and central Tunisia accessions ( Table 2). A narrow range of C18:0 content (3.0â€“3.4%), overlapping with the range found in this work, was previously reported [ 17, 24].
